document_data.name: ''Druul's Kiss''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Druul's Kiss''''' was an [[enchanted]] curvy-braided [[dagger]] from the ruined city of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Powers: ''Druul's Kiss'' possessed a potent ''+5'' enchantment and allowed the wielder to cast the ''[[Poison (spell)|poison]]'' [[spell]]. This magic came at a price to the wielder, as ''Druul's Kiss'' dramatically reduced the owner's charisma.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, members of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] occupied the ruined city of Myth Drannor. One of the Cult's Overseers stationed in the depths of the [[Elven Catacombs]] wielded ''Druul's Kiss'' and the ''[[sceptre of Leogans]]''. The Overseer answered directly to [[Kya Mordrayn]], the [[Wearer of Purple]] who helmed the operations in Myth Drannor.
